GSD.description:
PM: EM: convert power field to micro-Watts precision and align drivers

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit bfd4c6710d22c939bebc2f34e897e919a9f01ad5. For more details please see the references link.
